entry.title: [GLOBAL][PublicCloud] - Customers migration Kubernetes to 1.24
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 8, 2024, 07:00 - 18:00 UTC

Nov 16, 21:14 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 08/01/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 08/01/2024 18:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version
Service improvement : As Kubernetes 1.23 comes to the end of its life, we will be migrating to the next version (1.24).

entry.title: [GR5/GR7/GR9/GR11/SBG5/WAW1/BHS5/SGP1/VA1/OR1/SYD1][ManagedKubernetesService] - Deprecation of the Kubernetes version 1.25
entry.content:
Dec 13, 14:28 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Dec 13, 13:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 12, 19:30 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/12/2023 13:00 UTC
End time : 13/12/2023 14:00 UTC
Service impact : Delivery and reset of Managed Kubernetes clusters v1.25 disabled
Ongoing actions : Following our end-of-support policy, the Managed Kubernetes Service team will mark as deprecated the Kubernetes version 1.25. It will no longer be possible to create Managed Kubernetes clusters under the 1.25 version, or to reset existing clusters into this version. For more details, please refer to these documentations: https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/kubernetes/eos-eol-policies/ and https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/kubernetes/kubernetes-plugins-software-versions-reserved-resources/

Nov 15, 14:51 UTC
Identified - Start time : 14/11/2023 22:06 UTC
Service impact : We wish to inform you of a potential shortage in our datacenters GRA and SBG, specifically in regions GRA5/7/9/11 and SBG5/7.
Due to high demand, there might be limited availability of resources for the following flavours: B2, C2, T1, T2, and T3.
We will get back to you as soon as possible with more information.

entry.title: [GRA3][Public Cloud] - Neutron network issue
entry.content:
Nov 29, 20:00 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 29/11/2023 17:00 UTC
End time : 29/11/2023 19:57 UTC
Root cause : Software issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Nov 29, 18:32 UTC
Identified - Start time : 29/11/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : An issue has been discovered relating to the networking component (Neutron). The impact can be observed on both public and private networks.
Impact is limited and not all VMs are impacted. The bug may not impact a VM, but after action such as reboot or migration may cause issues with network.
Workaround : We recommend avoiding actions such as restart and reinstall of instances.
Ongoing actions : The bug is identified and the teams are mobilised to resolve the issue as soon as possible.

entry.title: [GRA7/GRA11][Public Cloud] - Electrical Issue
entry.content:
Nov 24, 13:48 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 16/11/2023 01:55 UTC
End time : 16/11/2023 08:32 UTC
Root cause : Electrical issue on room G263 in GRA2

On 16/11/2023 at 01:55 UTC, room G263 of the Graveline datacenter (GRA2) experienced an electrical incident that may have impacted your services. The intervention of our technical teams enabled you to return your services in the morning (16/11 at 08:32 UTC).
We then secured the infrastructure by making the system redundant.
The services are once again in nominal operation.

Nov 16, 07:38 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 16/11/2023 01:55 UTC
Service impact : Impacted nodes unreachable. Impacted volumes cannot be dettach and attach to new nodes in case of Kubernetes workloads rescheduling. APIserver not impacted. Management of the cluster not impacted.
Root cause :Electrical issue
Ongoing actions : Our team monitoring this situation

Nov 16, 04:07 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Nov 16, 03:57 UTC
Identified - Start time : 16/11/2023 01:55 UTC
Service impact : Impacted nodes unreachable. Impacted volumes cannot be dettach and attach to new nodes in case of Kubernetes workloads rescheduling. APIserver not impacted. Management of the cluster not impacted.
Root cause : https://bare-metal-servers.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/sdv7r15bh9lf // https://public-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/6sd9lwym7zdt
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Nov 16, 03:56 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Nov 16, 03:29 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 16/11/2023 01:55 UTC
Service impact : Impacted nodes unreachable. Impacted volumes cannot be dettach and attach to new nodes in case of Kubernetes workloads rescheduling. APIserver not impacted. Management of the cluster not impacted.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [SGP/SYD/BHS/SBG/GRA][Object Storage] - RFC
entry.content:
Nov 20, 10:34 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 20, 08:31 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 27, 14:44 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 20/11/2023 08:30 UTC
End time : 21/11/2023 10:30 UTC
Service impact : Customers must follow RFC rules to avoid having disruptions on their requests
Service improvement : We are planning to upgrade IPLB from November 20th to November 21th.
This upgrade will add support for TLS 1.3 as well as strict compliance with RFC7540.
Particularly on section 8.1.2 which implies that our services will answer http responses with lowercase headers.
Here is the maintenance planning:
- Start time : 20/11/2023 08:30 UTC SGP/SYD/BHS
End time : 20/11/2023 10:30 UTC
- Start time : 21/11/2023 08:30 UTC SBG/GRA
End time :21/11/2023 10:30 UTC
Related maintenances:
https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/wmynv3nz50nq
https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/27nm3jqxz19z
